createStatement: CREATE TABLE Traits ('ID' integer primary key autoincrement , 'Type' text  not null unique , 'Description' text , 'ShortDescription' text , 'LevelExperienceModifier' integer default 0 , 'GreatPeopleRateModifier' integer default 0 , 'GreatScientistRateModifier' integer default 0 , 'GreatGeneralRateModifier' integer default 0 , 'GreatGeneralExtraBonus' integer default 0 , 'GreatPersonGiftInfluence' integer default 0 , 'MaxGlobalBuildingProductionModifier' integer default 0 , 'MaxTeamBuildingProductionModifier' integer default 0 , 'MaxPlayerBuildingProductionModifier' integer default 0 , 'CityUnhappinessModifier' integer default 0 , 'PopulationUnhappinessModifier' integer default 0 , 'CityStateBonusModifier' integer default 0 , 'CityStateFriendshipModifier' integer default 0 , 'CityStateCombatModifier' integer default 0 , 'LandBarbarianConversionPercent' integer default 0 , 'LandBarbarianConversionExtraUnits' integer default 0 , 'SeaBarbarianConversionPercent' 'CapitalThemingBonusModifier' integer default 0 , 'PolicyCostModifier' integer default 0 , 'CityConnectionTradeRouteChange' integer default 0 , 'WonderProductionModifier' integer default 0 , 0 , 'GoldenAgeGreatWriterRateModifier' integer default 0 , 'ExtraEmbarkMoves' integer default 0 , 'NaturalWonderFirstFinderGold' integer default 0 , 'NaturalWonderSubsequentFinderGold' integer default 0 , 'NaturalWonderYieldModifier' integer default 0 , 'NaturalWonderHappinessModifier' integer default 0 , 'NearbyImprovementCombatBonus' integer default 0 , 'NearbyImprovementBonusRange' integer default 0 , 'CultureBuildingYieldChange' integer default 0 , 'CombatBonusVsHigherTech' integer default 0 , 'CombatBonusVsLargerCiv' integer default 0 , 'RazeSpeedModifier' integer default 0 , 'DOFGreatPersonModifier' integer default 0 , 'LuxuryHappinessRetention' integer default 0 , 'ExtraSpies' integer default 0 , 'UnresearchedTechBonusFromKills' integer default 0 , 'ExtraFoundedCityTerritoryClaimRange' integer default 0 , 'FreeSocialPoliciesPerEra' integer default 0 , 'NumTradeRoutesModifier' integer default 0 , 'TradeRouteResourceModifier' integer default 0 , boolean default 0 , 'FasterAlongRiver' boolean default 0 , 'FasterInHills' boolean default 0 , 'EmbarkedAllWater' boolean default 0 , 'EmbarkedToLandFlatCost' boolean default 0 , 'NoHillsImprovementMaintenance' boolean default 0 , 'TechBoostFromCapitalScienceBuildings' boolean default 0 , 'StaysAliveZeroCities' boolean default 0 , 'FaithFromUnimprovedForest' boolean default 0 , 'BonusReligiousBelief' boolean default 0 , 'AbleToAnnexCityStates' boolean default 0 , 'CrossesMountainsAfterGreatGeneral' boolean default 0 , 'MayaCalendarBonuses' boolean default 0 , 'NoAnnexing' boolean default 0 , 'TechFromCityConquer' boolean default 0 , 'UniqueLuxuryRequiresNewArea' boolean default 0 , 'RiverTradeRoad' boolean default 0 , 'AngerFreeIntrusionOfCityStates' boolean default 0 , 'FreeUnit' text default NULL , 'FreeUnitPrereqTech' text default NULL , 'CombatBonusImprovement' text default NULL , 'FreeBuilding' text default NULL , 'FreeBuildingOnConquest' text default NULL , 'ObsoleteTech' text default NULL , 'PrereqTech' text default NULL , PurchasedUnitsBonusXP integer DEFAULT 0, IgnoreTradeDistanceScaling boolean DEFAULT 0, CanPlunderWithoutWar boolean DEFAULT 0, NoConnectionUnhappiness boolean DEFAULT 0, CanPurchaseNavalUnitsFaith boolean DEFAULT 0, ImportsCountTowardsMonopolies boolean DEFAULT 0, IsNoReligiousStrife boolean DEFAULT 0, WonderProductionModGA integer DEFAULT 0, NonSpecialistFoodChange integer DEFAULT 0, AnnexedCityStatesGiveYields boolean DEFAULT 0, IsOddEraScaler boolean DEFAULT 0, IsCapitalOnly boolean DEFAULT 0, NoNaturalReligionSpread boolean DEFAULT 0, NoOpenTrade boolean DEFAULT 0, FreeCapitalBuilding text REFERENCES Buildings (Type), CombatBonusVsHigherPop integer DEFAULT 0, NumFreeBuildings integer DEFAULT 0, NationalPopReqModifier integer DEFAULT 0, FreeBuildingPrereqTech text REFERENCES Technologies (Type), CapitalFreeBuildingPrereqTech text REFERENCES Technologies (Type), BullyAnnex boolean DEFAULT 0, IgnoreBullyPenalties boolean DEFAULT 0, AllianceCSDefense integer DEFAULT 0, AllianceCSStrength integer DEFAULT 0, TourismToGAP integer DEFAULT 0, GoldToGAP integer DEFAULT 0, EventTourismBoost integer DEFAULT 0, EventGP integer DEFAULT 0, PolicyGEorGM integer DEFAULT 0, GAGarrisonCityRangeStrikeModifier integer DEFAULT 0, GoldenAgeOnWar boolean DEFAULT 0, UnableToCancelRazing boolean 0, CSBullyMilitaryStrengthModifier integer DEFAULT 0, CSBullyValueModifier integer DEFAULT 0, DiplomaticMarriage boolean DEFAULT 0, IsAdoptionFreeTech boolean DEFAULT 0, GrowthBoon integer DEFAULT 0, WLTKDGPImprovementModifier integer DEFAULT 0, GPWLTKD boolean DEFAULT 0, ExpansionWLTKD boolean DEFAULT 0, GreatWorkWLTKD boolean DEFAULT 0, PermanentYieldsDecreaseEveryEra boolean DEFAULT 0, integer DEFAULT 0, GPFaithPurchaseEra text REFERENCES Eras (Type), FaithCostModifier integer DEFAULT 0, InvestmentModifier integer DEFAULT 0, WLTKDCultureBoost integer DEFAULT 0, WLTKDFromGATurns integer DEFAULT 0, WLTKDUnhappinessNeedsMod integer DEFAULT 0, StartingSpies integer DEFAULT 0, SpyOffensiveStrengthModifier integer DEFAULT 0, MinorQuestYieldModifier integer DEFAULT 0, CultureBonusModifierConquest integer DEFAULT 0, ProductionBonusModifierConquest integer DEFAULT 0, SpySecurityModifier integer DEFAULT 0, SpyExtraRankBonus integer DEFAULT 0, SpyMoveRateModifier integer DEFAULT 0, CityConquestGWAM integer DEFAULT 0, SharedReligionTourismModifier integer DEFAULT 0, BestUnitSpawnOnImpDOW boolean DEFAULT 0, BestUnitImprovement text REFERENCES Improvements (Type), GGGARateFromDenunciationsAndWars integer DEFAULT 0, WarWearinessModifier integer DEFAULT 0, EnemyWarWearinessModifier integer DEFAULT 0, BullyYieldMultiplierAnnex integer DEFAULT 0, FreeUnitOnConquest text REFERENCES Units (Type), TradeRouteMinorInfluenceAP boolean DEFAULT 0, ProdModFromNumSpecialists boolean DEFAULT 0, ConquestOfTheWorldCityAttack integer DEFAULT 0, ConquestOfTheWorld boolean DEFAULT 0, FreeUpgrade boolean DEFAULT 0, VotePerXCSFollowingYourReligion integer DEFAULT 0, ChanceToConvertReligiousUnits integer DEFAULT 0, WarsawPact boolean DEFAULT 0, EnemyWarSawPactPromotion text REFERENCES UnitPromotions (Type), FreeZuluPikemanToImpi boolean DEFAULT 0, ExtraMissionaryStrength integer DEFAULT 0, CanGoldInternalTradeRoutes boolean DEFAULT 0, DEFAULT 0, ExtraSupplyPerCity integer DEFAULT 0, ExtraSupplyPerPopulation integer DEFAULT 0, CityAutomatonWorkersChange integer DEFAULT 0, CityWorkingChange integer DEFAULT 0, AnyBelief boolean DEFAULT 0, AlwaysReligion boolean DEFAULT 0, CrossesIce integer DEFAULT 0, ObsoleteBelief text REFERENCES Beliefs (Type), PrereqBelief text REFERENCES Beliefs (Type), ObsoletePolicy text REFERENCES Policies (Type), PrereqPolicy text REFERENCES Policies (Type), SeaTradeRouteRangeBonus integer DEFAULT 0, UnhappyUnitProductionMod integer DEFAULT 0, NoAvoidGrowth boolean DEFAULT 0, RevoltTimerMod integer DEFAULT 0, ArtistGoldenAgeTechBoost boolean DEFAULT 0, foreign key (Description) references Language_en_US(Tag), foreign key (ShortDescription) references Language_en_US(Tag), foreign key (FreeUnit) references UnitClasses(Type), foreign key (FreeUnitPrereqTech) references Technologies(Type), foreign key (CombatBonusImprovement) references Improvements(Type), foreign key (FreeBuilding) references Buildings(Type), foreign key (FreeBuildingOnConquest) references Buildings(Type), foreign key (ObsoleteTech) references Technologies(Type), foreign key (PrereqTech) references Technologies(Type))
